screenshots.description: Daily Wage Calculation main interface showing three services: Salary proration (Basic salary + allowances / 30.45 days), EOS leave encashment (Basic salary + allowances / 22 days), and Unpaid leave deduction (Basic salary + allowances / 30 days)
Salary Proration configuration dialog showing Month calculation dropdown (set to Custom days), Number of days field (30.45), and formula display: Daily wage = (Basic salary + allowances) / 30.45 days
Month calculation dropdown expanded showing all three calculation basis options: Working days, Calendar days, and Custom days (currently selected)

End of Service eligibility configuration showing Paid Leave Types table with Vacation45 leave type and daily rate calculation (Basic salary + allowances / Custom days). Configure button available for detailed settings.
